奲奲奲

奲字的基本解释

奲
duǒ
富厚：富奲奲的样子。
古同“軃”。
物重下垂的样子。

奲
chě
宽大。

奲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duǒ］
［《集韻》典可切，上哿，端。］
富貌。
[②]［chě］
［《廣韻》昌者切，上馬，昌。］
(1)宽大。
(2)年号用字。奲都，西夏毅宗年号（公元1057－1062年）。

奲字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【大字部】　奲； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页254第21
【廣韻】昌也切【集韻】【韻會】齒者切【正韻】昌者切，?音撦。寬大也。　又紀元之號。夏國諒祚攺元奲都。　又【集韻】典可切，音姼。富奲奲貌。　又齒善切，音闡。義同。　俗作嚲，非。

奲字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
奲字的起名意思

暂无。

Xi
Basic explanation of words
Xi
duǒ
Fu Hou: The appearance of Fu Xia.
Ancient Tong "軃".
The appearance of the weight sagging.
Xi
chě
Lenient.
Xi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duǒ］
["Jiyun" Code can be cut, top and end. ]
Rich appearance.
[②] [chě]
["Guangyun" prosperous people cut, go on horse, prosper. ]
(1) Leniency.
(2) The word for the year number. Xidu, the reign of Yizong in Xixia (1057-1062 AD).
Xi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Big Character Department] 　奲; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 254 No. 21
[Guang Yun] Chang also cuts [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] cuts the teeth [Zheng Yun] cuts the prosperous,? Yin 撦. Leniency too.　The name of another era. Xia Guoliang Zuo Yin Yuan Xidu.　[Jiyun] Code can be cut, sound is 姼. Rich and magnificent appearance.　The teeth are cut again, the sound is explained. The same meaning.　Usually, it is not.
